item_description: A blanket is a swath of soft cloth large enough either to cover or to enfold most of the user's body and thick enough to keep the body warm.
A coloring book is a type of book containing line art to which people are intended to add color using crayons, colored pencils.
A stuffed toy is a toy doll with an outer fabric sewn from a textile and stuffed with flexible material.
Puzzles can help children develop their cognitive skills
Hand sanitizers are products that typically come in a spray or a gel that, when applied to your hands as directed, can reduce the number of potentially disease-causing germs on your hands.
Put simply, essential oil diffusers work by emitting essential oils into the air.
An air purifier or air cleaner is a device which removes contaminants from the air in a room to improve indoor air quality.
A pillow is a support of the body at rest for comfort, therapy, or decoration.
A nebulizer is a small machine that turns liquid medicine into a mist that can be easily inhaled.
A humidifier is a device, primarily an electrical appliance, that increases humidity
A sock is worn on the foot and is almost always made of cloth, such as cotton or wool.
To relieve pain and soothe the itching associated with eczema, dry skin, minor skin irritations, insect bites and, a fast-acting, long-lasting itch relief cream can help.
Diaper Rash Cream. These creams prevent diaper rashes using the barrier method.
A natural facial cream for dry and sensitive skin that leaves the skin with a velvety feel.
